esema meya manawin pawathwagena yama sandaha ee mahathage birinda mallika wirasekara mahathmiyagen ituwana sewaya da sulupatu nowana bawa da hethema sandahan karayi.thama niwese wada katayuthu kothek thibunath, ee siyalla paseka thaba poth laba ganimata paminena patakayinge awashyatha itukirimata aya kapawi katayuthu karana ayuru mehidi daka ganimata haki wiya.me pusthakalaye pothpath pamanak nowa, parani gath kathuwarun ha lekhakayin rasakage ath akuru, assan, di. es., dadli, bandaranayaka, wani hitapu jana nayakayinge assan sahitha lekhana da, des wides muddara, iparani mudal nottu, mudal kasi wani pauranika boho de surakshitha kota anagathaye du daruwanta daka bala ganimata ida salasimata bandara mahatha katayuthu yoda atha.thama wishrama watupa paudgalika sukhawiharanayata yoda gannawata wada anagatha parapurata wadadayaka yamak kirima aramunu karagena me pusthakalaya pawathwagena yana bawath, mewani pusthakala pilibandawa adhikshanaya kota sahana milata ho wadi wattamak sahithawa poth laba ganimata baladharinge awadhanaya yomu wanne nam eya patakayan wenuwen itukarana sewayak bawa senarath bandara wirasekara mahatha awadharanaya karayi.mema pusthakalaya pilibanda wadi wisthara 081-2404897 durakathana ankaya amatha labagatha haka.satahana ha chayarupamahanama galahitiyawamahanuwara uthura wisheshakarthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

merata wishwawidyalawalata wen karana mudal kisidu kappaduwakata path kara nathi bawath wen karana mudala wadi wuwath rate dala deshiya nishpadanaya ihala yama nisa wen karana mudale anupathaya adu wi athi bawath usas adhyapana amathi es bi disanayaka mahatha parlimenthuwe di eeye (20) prakasha kaleya.wasara 2012 di kolambaa wishwawidyalaya sandaha pamanak rupiyal biliyana 1.3k wen kala bawath ema mudala ehi siyaluma awashyathawan sampurna karalimata pramanawath bawa da ki disanayaka mahatha mahapola shishyadhara mudala wadikirima sandaha awashya katayuthu karagena yana bawa da kiya.hambanthota disthrik manthri sajith premadasa mahatha asa thibu prashnayakata pilithuru demin mema karunu pahadili kala amathiwaraya wishwawidyalawalata awashya tharam mudal laba dimata hakiyawa athi bawath wishwawidyala newasikagara 64k pihituwimata rupiyal biliyana 14k laba di athi bawath kiya.ada wishwawidyalawala prashnaya wanne idam hingaya bawa ki disanayaka mahatha rupiyal 400 sita ihalata wasarakata newasika gasthu aya karana bawath, sisungen aya karana mudala widuliya ha jala bilpath sandahawath pramanawath nowana bawath, 1977 sita pawathi ejapa aanduwa kisidu wishwawidyalayaka newasikagarayak pihitawuye nathi athara sisunta newasikagara laba nodime prathipaththiyak ema rajaya anugamanaya kala bawa da penwa dunneya.ranil wikramasinha mahatha agamathiwarayawa sitiya wasara deke di hara anek sama wasarakama wishwawidyala sandaha labadena mudal warshikawa wadikara athi bawa ki disanayaka mahatha ada sisunge aakalpa ha awashyatha wenas wi athi bawath, wahana nathara kirimata sthana illa sitimata tharam sisun diyunuwi athi bawath kiya.
